title: Technical question about 3.5mm jack on Pixel 4a
content:
Hello,

I would like to use a corded, mic'ed headset with the Pixel 4a. I see that it has a 3.5mm jack, but I can't tell if that jack supports a 4-pole plug (ground, mic, left speaker, right speaker) or if it only supports a 3-pole plug (ground, left speaker, right speaker).

Thanks in advance; any information would be helpful!

-=CC=-
